paper_abstract: In order to evaluate the goodness of frequency hopping sequence design, the aperiodic Hamming correlation function is used as an important measure. In this letter, the aperiodic Hamming correlation lower bounds for frequency hopping sequences with low hit zone which have not yet been reported previously are established.
paper_title: Lower Bounds on the Aperiodic Hamming Correlations of Frequency Hopping Sequences with Low Hit Zone
